content: It is reported that a local car blogger in Taiyuan spoke up for the victim's family, but the video was deleted.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of October 24, on Luzi Yaomiao Street in Nanchang, owners of unfinished buildings held up signs reading "Long Live the Communist Party of China" to defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 25, the General Office of the State Council released the holiday arrangements for 2024.
There will be no holiday on New Year's Eve in 24 years. It seems that the State Council is reminding everyone to celebrate New Year's Eve.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On October 25, a student from Zhangjiakou College died suddenly while running during the National Defense Reserve Camp training. His parents went to the school gate to seek justice.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ

October 24, Baoding, Hebei, Central Judicial Police College.
During the school's exercise, the banner of the protesters read "We want fairness, we want justice"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"Workers are squeezed to the bone, but the loud voices make the officials break their defenses."
Due to the huge public opposition and criticism against not giving a holiday on New Year's Eve, the National Development and Reform Commission reposted four sophistry blog posts in a row, which was ridiculed by netizens

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On October 25, the owners of Evergrande's unfinished building in Hong'an County, Huanggang City, Hubei Province went to the gate of the Provincial Bureau of Letters and Calls to petition, but the bureau closed the door and refused to let the petitioners in.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 24, Zhihu's second most searched topic: National housing prices have dropped 16% from their peak, and 57 cities have continued to drop for three consecutive months. How do you view this phenomenon? Will housing prices continue to fall in the future?
But after just one night, this question was hidden and no longer on the most searched topic
There are many answers, and I suggest you go to Zhihu to read them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 23, a student club at Sichuan University organized a Halloween event titled "Inviting all universities to join the 'Night Parade of One Hundred Ghosts'" which attracted the attention of the government's Cyberspace Administration, which sent a warning message to the school.
Then the school's publicity department found the relevant clubs and asked them to cancel the event and delete the information about organizing the event on the grounds that they could not celebrate foreign festivals.
